tweets.text:
On MONDAY 12 APRIL we reach the next milestone on the #Roadmap out of #Lockdown

We want people to enjoy themselves while making sure they #StaySafe 

So keep following the national #HandsFaceSpace #FreshAir guidance to keep rates of #COVID19 down in the #WestMidlands https://t.co/NBpJ8CCp5f

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 After my concerns you then informed me your going to increas the permit for waste, your smell tests let us down and I would like them stopped with a reassessment of new technology to protect people in the future!
@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Now like flooding this is an enviromental emergency where lives are at risk. !!!!

Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg

Excited to be touring 'This Island's Mine' later this summer, connecting communities from Leeds - Skipton with Developing the Natural Aire #DNAire @aireriverstrust
https://t.co/CVKPKb44Gs
Thanks to support from @EnvAgency @CravenCouncil @HeritageFundUK & @YorkshireWater

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 When I contacted you last year with my concerns that I could smell LFG in my home and garden your reply was basically put up with it, now we are thousands united and it's a risk to health with toxins and carcinogens will you tell us what went wrong?

@TonyShe54 Agreed... The @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA appear to have a extremely casual attitude to this or they have found ‚Äòsomething‚Äô they are extremely concerned about and wish to test further? which is it? Have @PHE_uk been notified? @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

Trying to have some time to myself now my child‚Äôs in bed.

3months pregnant also and having to deal with the stink in my own home. Where is my HUMAN RIGHT to clean, fresh air? There is no escape. 
#stopthestink 

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC https://t.co/FhlAS7fzWz

Now this is the story all about how
My life filled with stink, turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there
I'll tell you how we long for a town with clean air! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk #shameonREDINDUSTRIES #REDINDUSTRIES #landfill

@RowanN_TandA @bradfordmdc @Bradford_TandA @EnvAgencyYNE @bradfordmdc still hasn't tided up the back of Silverdale Road BD5. I've now seen evidence of rats in my cellar. See footprints in the picture. This city is absolutely filthy. When is the council going to act? https://t.co/5yWyEK7ufJ

Little film. Big oaks with blue marks.  Some parts of this madness will run 8 lanes of expressway/1991A30 parallel through four farmers‚Äô fields.  Old old oak and habitat, holly, sycamore, full of birdsong this morning. Ecocide. https://t.co/Xwfjrw2eb0
